General.Name: Ouster Inc
General.Description: Ouster, Inc. designs and manufactures high-resolution digital lidar sensors and enabling software that offers 3D vision to machinery, vehicles, robots, and fixed infrastructure assets. Its product portfolio includes OS, a scanning sensor; and DF, a solid-state flash sensor. The company is based in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 350 Treat Avenue, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94110
